title: Fountain Press Release - Second Release in July
content:
July 17, 2003 Malmo, Sweden   
   
The Fountain catalogue has been updated with the release of 2 new type families:   
   
Borgstrand - a mechanical font inspired by an old neon sign designed by Martin Fredrikson.   
[[http://www.fountain.nu/catalogue/borgstrand.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020145737/http:/www.fountain.nu/catalogue/borgstrand.asp) ]   
   
FTN Sauerkrauto- a family based on german license plates also designed by Martin Fredrikson.   
[[http://www.fountain.nu/catalogue/sauerkrauto.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020145737/http:/www.fountain.nu/catalogue/sauerkrauto.asp) ]   
   
   
  
Malm
author: peterbruhn
